meanings.definition: Combine or cause to combine to form a single entity.
meanings.sent1: The two rivers merges into one large stream.
meanings.sent2: The colors of the sunset merges beautifully in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The flavors of chocolate and mint merges to create a delicious ice cream.
meanings.sent4: The music and dance merges seamlessly in the performance.
meanings.sent5: The artist merges different styles to create a unique painting.

meanings.definition: Blend or cause to blend gradually into something else.
meanings.sent1: The paint colors merges softly on the canvas.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of spices merges in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The laughter of the children merges with the sound of the waves.
meanings.sent4: The scent of flowers merges with the fresh air of the garden.
meanings.sent5: The flavors of the dish merges perfectly in every bite.

meanings.definition: Join or cause to join together.
meanings.sent1: The puzzle pieces merges to complete the picture.
meanings.sent2: The team members merges their ideas to create a winning strategy.
meanings.sent3: The two roads merges into a single path ahead.
meanings.sent4: The voices of the choir merges in harmony during the performance.
meanings.sent5: The threads merges to form a strong bond in the fabric.
